================
Skailar internals
================

Documentation for people hacking on Skailar itself. This is the place to go if
you'd like to help improve Skailar or learn about how Skailar is managed.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   contributing/index
   mailing-lists
   organization
   security
   release-process
   deprecation
   git
   howto-release-skailar
